Package com.xebisco.yield

Class YldScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.YldB
      • com.xebisco.yield.YldScene
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    YldGame, YldProgressScene
    public class YldScene
extends YldB
    A YldScene is the base of a Yield game, it contains the Entities, YldGraphics and the Systems, it's used to alternate between game moments.
    Since:
    4_alpha1
    Author:
    Xebisco

        Returns:

      • rayCast

        public final RayCast rayCast​(Entity requestingEntity,
                             Vector2 point1,
                             Vector2 point2)
        Raycast from point1 to point2 and return the closest hit.
        Parameters:
        requestingEntity - The entity that is requesting the raycast.
        point1 - The starting point of the raycast.
        point2 - The end point of the ray.
        Returns:
        A RayCast object.
